Information We Collect When you visit our website or use our services, we may collect personal information in various ways, including: 1. Information You Provide: When you make a reservation, create an account, fill out a form, participate in a promotion or survey, or interact with us in any other way, you may provide us with personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, mailing address, payment information, and other relevant details. 2. To provide and improve our services, including processing reservations, payments, and requests; 2. Business Transactions: In the event of a merger, acquisition, reorganization, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of the transaction. Security We take reasonable measures to protect the security of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security. Your Choices You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. You can do so by logging into your account or contacting us directly. You may also unsubscribe from promotional emails or newsletters by following the instructions provided in the communication. Children's Privacy Our website and services are not intended for children under the age of 18.
